00014 
00015 /* No optimized variants available. */
00016 
00017 L4_INLINE void
00018 l4util_set_bit32(int b, volatile l4_uint32_t * dest)
00019 {
00020   // for ARM sizeof(l4_umword_t) == sizeof(l4_uint32_t)
00021   l4util_set_bit(b, (volatile l4_umword_t *)dest);
00022 }
